sn56.18:1.1: Atha kho annataro bhikkhu yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn56.18:1.5: “Yam kho, bhikkhu, dukkhe nanam, dukkhasamudaye nanam, dukkhanirodhe nanam, dukkhanirodhagaminiya patipadaya nanam—
sn56.18:2.1: Tasmatiha, bhikkhu, ‘idam dukkhan’ti yogo karaniyo …pe… ‘ayam dukkhanirodhagamini patipada’ti yogo karaniyo”ti.
